column4: is it always the same in windows and always the same in ubuntu?
if running from a live cd it always changes in ubuntu and with a wubi install it stays (at least for a couple days) the same but in windows it has been the same for several months
seems very weird to me. Are the address very close to the same, or are they very different?
one is a 76.171.* and the other is a 76.168.*
